verses.text: \w A|strong="H3068"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself. Unto thee \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* cry, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* thou silent \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3468"\w*: lest thou \w be|strong="H3068"\w* silent \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3468"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* become \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* go down into \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit.

Hear, O Lord, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* supplication, \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* pray \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee; \w when|strong="H5307"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* lift \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy holy temple.

Draw \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* away \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5921"\w* iniquity destroy \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4421"\w* speak peace \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* neighbour, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* evils \w are|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H2416"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* works, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* inventions. According \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* works \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w give|strong="H2416"\w* thou \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: render \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* reward.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* understood \w the|strong="H3588"\w* works \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* operations \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* hands: thou shalt destroy \w them|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3588"\w* build \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w*.

Blessed \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath heard \w the|strong="H5921"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* supplication.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* helper \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* protector: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* hath \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* confided, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* helped. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* flesh hath flourished again, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* praise \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* protector \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anointed.

Save, \w O|strong="H5203"\w* Lord, thy \w people|strong="H5800"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* bless thy inheritance: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* rule \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* exalt \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* ever.
